name: Camouflario
description:
Play without touching your screen!

Camouflario is all about rhythm. Camouflage between your allies and beware the predator!

How to Play?
- Tap your table to pulse (Don't touch the screen!).
- Pulse in the same rhythm of your friends to hide between them!

Pulse to the rhythm of the music and camouflage!
The predator will never find you.
